lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Dodgers ace Clayton Kershaw received an epidural injection for his sore lower back and will be placed on the 15-day disabled list, manager Dave Roberts said before Thursday's game in Milwaukee.

headline.print_headline: Dodgers to Place Kershaw on DL With Lower Back Problem
headline.main: Dodgers to Place Kershaw on DL With Lower Back Problem

snippet: Los Angeles Dodgers ace Clayton Kershaw received an epidural injection for his sore lower back and will be placed on the 15-day disabled list, manager Dave Roberts said before Thursday's game in Milwaukee....
